TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
Destiny is almost upon us, my young friend. We require only one final piece before Lord Sartek returns. We must reclaim his skull.
Destiny is almost upon us, my young friend. We require only one final piece before Lord Sartek returns. We must reclaim his skull.
Destiny is almost upon us, my young friend. We require only one final piece before Lord Sartek returns. We must reclaim his skull.
Destiny is almost upon us, my young friend. We require only one final piece before Lord Sartek returns. We must reclaim his skull.
Where do we find it?
Where do we find it?
Where do we find it?
Where do we find it?
Minogoth himself protects it in the Horned Citadel of Ohtar. Lord Bane has sent one of his greatest generals to ensure that his old foe, Sartek, does not return.
Minogoth himself protects it in the Horned Citadel of Ohtar. Lord Bane has sent one of his greatest generals to ensure that his old foe, Sartek, does not return.
Minogoth himself protects it in the Horned Citadel of Ohtar. Lord Bane has sent one of his greatest generals to ensure that his old foe, Sartek, does not return.
Minogoth himself protects it in the Horned Citadel of Ohtar. Lord Bane has sent one of his greatest generals to ensure that his old foe, Sartek, does not return.
Then we must defeat Minogoth. I'll do whatever it takes to save my people.
Then we must defeat Minogoth. I'll do whatever it takes to save my people.
Then we must defeat Minogoth. I'll do whatever it takes to save my people.
Then we must defeat Minogoth. I'll do whatever it takes to save my people.

Even if you defeat him, Minogoth will rise again, stronger than before. It has been this way as long as his master, Lord Bane, controls him. All you need do is battle him long enough to let us take the skull. After Sartek is made whole and leads us again, he will sweep Minogoth and his minions from our lands.
